title: Michael Land: The Secret of Monkey Island (PC speaker version)
description:
Michael Land et alii*: The Secret of Monkey Island (monophony EP)

13 minutes of painful nostalgia! By popular request I recorded the PC speaker version to present it here. It's true PC speaker music, no emulators have been used.
